headline: Democrats find a tax their GOP colleagues want to leave intact
author: Steve Benen
sentences: Indeed, it seems likely that voters will be hearing this message quite a bit from these Democrats in the coming months: As public concerns over inflation grow, vulnerable Senate incumbents will say they’re at least making tangible efforts to give consumers a break.
